q: MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained "more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers." The article asks, Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page? Spin off? While there's no reason to think Google would kill off Google Apps, there are scenarios that could trouble enterprise customers, Gartner analysts say. Google investors could conceivably push the company

Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. "There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly," Page said. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him The change in command overshadowed Google Inc. 's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the company cranked up its Internet marketing machine during the holiday shopping season. Fillmore man sentenced to 60 years

judge and new CNN talkshow host told Metro that he was shocked by the powerful position to which the the Liberal Democrat leader has since risen. Asked who were his most difficult interviewees, Piers Morgan said: Ones who emerge as fairly imbecilic. Nick Clegg stands out; my GQ interview with him was a series of spectacular own goals. "I thought,' I hope he never ends up running the country' and whoa- here he is. How can this guy be so powerful? It's frightening. He added: " Simon Cowell was tough because we're friends but he was also my boss and he wouldn't be afraid to use that advantage- but it made for good TV." EastEnders:

... It just[ felt] negative." The "Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added, "I will say that it"s a kinder, gentler[ show now.]"

Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government, Mr. David Cameron said. He's very strong. He's very elusive in the pocket, Ellis said. "A lot of people don't realize how fast he is.... I know he looks slow moving around on the field, but he's pretty nifty at what he does."

bragging rights? Luis Cruz La Mirada I am appalled and embarrassed by California Treasurer Bill Lockyer 's immature response to the Texas budget crisis. He is quoted as saying, Someone just turned the lights on in the bar, and the sexiest state doesn't look so pretty anymore.
